page.title: 20FOOTBALL AND ICE CREAM
page.content: {Football.}This is a game where you have two sides of eleven players a rectangular field,and two nets which are two poles with netting in between You also need a football which is a big round leather shape.Each side has to score a goal which is when the ball goes into the other sides net.When you finish the side with the most goals has won.{Ice cream}is a game when one person is on.All the other people who are playing start a few metres away behind the person who is on.They all have to try to get to where to the single person is standing.This person has to look the opposite way.He can turn round when he likes if he sees anyone moving they have to start again.If someone succeeds they shout ice cream and they are now on.
